question: Which Indian sportsperson has been honoured with a IAAF Veteran Pin ?
explanation: During the 52nd IAAF Congress at Doha, Indian track and field legend PT UshaÂ has been honoured with a IAAF Veteran Pin by the International Association of Athletic Federations (IAAF) in recognition of her contribution to the growth of the sport. She is often called the \"queen of track and field\". At the 1982 New Delhi Asian Games, Usha won silver in 100m and 200m events. At the Asian Championships in Kuwait City in 1983, she won gold in 400m. In the 1985 Jakarta Asian Championships, Usha won six medals - five gold and a bronze.
